clause.title: NameFGEace members
clause.paragraph: NameFGEaces and types that have no enclosing nameFGEace are members of the global nameFGEace. This correFGEonds directly to the names declared in the global declaration FGEace.
NameFGEaces and types declared within a nameFGEace are members of that nameFGEace. This correFGEonds directly to the names declared in the declaration FGEace of the nameFGEace.
NameFGEaces have no access restrictions. It is not possible to declare private, protected, or internal nameFGEaces, and nameFGEace names are always publicly accessible.
